attributes.action: reconsider the age of enlistment to the british forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i dont know about the rest of you , but i'm too old at 52 to join the army!!!!
I'm FIT, I'm A MARKSMAN WITH A GUN !!
 i'm streetwise and switched on.
I WOULD FIGHT FOR MY FAMILY, FRIENDS AND MY COUNTRY AND WINSTON CHURCHILL'S MEMORY...
Give ME and more like me the chance to enlist and make a difference.
THE YOUNG THAT ARE OUT THERE NOW NEED THE BENEFIT OF US.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
